item.description:
It is recommend for a meetup group that each person make his/her own reservation for the same tour time. Payment is required when you place the reservation. Be sure to tell them it's the Meetup group with Roseann at 1:30 on Sunday, June 5th.

Check it out.

http://leadershipsports.com/wordpress/ 

It's located less than 20 minutes south of Hartford, Connecticut and 20 minutes north of New Haven, Connecticut at 2011 South Main St in Middletown, CT.
item.why: It'll be both exciting and adventurous!!! Come on and give it a try!!! It's less than $50.00 and the experience will take about 2 hours. Perhaps afterwards, we can go for a drink or a bite to eat to share our experiences. We'll have a blast!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Zip Lining
